ai-tha-ap210:1.1_0: Having seen the state of grace,
ai-tha-ap210:2.2_0: I’ve praised the root of a tree;
ai-tha-ap210:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap210:4.2_0: I went to the realm of ancestors.
ai-tha-ap210:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap210:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Koḷiya.
ai-tha-ap210:7.1_0: and the eighth flower of flowers.
